item.title: Intelligent Cleaning Robot for Domestic Environment - Simulation in Webots
item.description: Abstract Cleaning is the most common household task we perform in our everyday life. For kids ages 2 to 5, tidying up their room and vacuum cleaning the house is a challenging and tiring task that most people faced in their day-to-day life. This report presents our Final Year Project of Intelligent Floor Cleaning Robot that can perform Object arrangement and Tidy up tasks in the Kidsâ€™ Room and efficient cleaning tasks for the Living Room.
